scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../app && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:program && npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:program && npm run test:api
scripts.setup:db: cd api && npm run migrate && npm run seed
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db && npm run build:program && npm run deploy:program
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules api/node_modules app/node_modules .anchor target api/dist app/.next
scripts.lint: cd api && npm run lint && cd ../app && npm run lint
